price: Dan mereka menanyakan kepadamu, "Benarkah (azab yang dijanjikan) itu? Katakanlah, "Ya, demi Tuhan-ku, sesungguhnya azab itu adalah benar dan kamu sekali-kali tidak bisa luput (darinya)".
arabic: ۞ وَيَسۡتَنۢبِـُٔونَكَ أَحَقٌّ هُوَۖ قُلۡ إِي وَرَبِّيٓ إِنَّهُۥ لَحَقّٞۖ وَمَآ أَنتُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wayastanbiūnaka aḥaqqun huwa qul ī warabbī innahu laḥaqqun wamā antum bimuʿ'jizīna
translations: And they ask you to inform
